title: Selena Gomez loves this cozy blanket-sweatshirt from 'Shark Tank'
text:
Our editorial team is dedicated to finding and telling you more about the products and deals we love. If you love them too and decide to purchase through the links below, we may receive a commission.

Some of the best inventions and products have come from ABC's "Shark Tank." There's the best-selling Scrub Daddy, Squatty Potty and even the holiday favorite, Tipsy Elves.

The latest fan-favorite is the perfect marriage between a hoodie and a blanket and Selena Gomez is a major fan. We present to you The Comfy. The wearable blanket, made from plush fluffy sherpa, will keep you warm and cozy all season long -- from the couch to outdoor sporting events. The as-seen-on "Shark Tank" product was backed by Barbara Corcoran and has totally replaced the once-beloved Snuggie.

The Comfy has a near perfect (4.8) star rating on Amazon and has garnered over a thousand positive reviews.

"I live near the beach and it is perfect for chilly mornings and cool evenings. I absolutely love mine. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the fabric. It feels so luxurious that I want to wear it all the time," a customer shared.

"I saw this on Shark Tank a while ago and thought I'd buy this for my daughter (16) because she's always using my Hoodies to keep warm while watching TV or reading. I was really surprised how well made it was and the type of material. Super soft and well worth the money if you want something to lounge around that's comfy," another fan wrote.



THE COMFY: Original Blanket Sweatshirt, $39.99 (Orig. $44.99)

Selena Gomez is one of "Shark Tank's" biggest fans. For the singer's birthday, her closest friends surprised her with a visit to a taping of the show. Check out the adorable clip below, when Gomez found out she would be fulfilling her "Shark Tank" dreams.
